src:
Bagaimana Rasanya Bikin Hattrick UCL di Usia 18 Tahun, Rodrygo?
07 Nov 2019, 06:15 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Rodrygo Goes berhasil mencatatkan namanya dalam buku sejarah Liga Champions. Penyerang muda Real Madrid ini membungkus hattrick sempurna pada kemenangan 6-0 atas Galatasaray, Kamis (7/11/2019) dini hari WIB.
Bermain di Santiago Bernabeu, Los Blancos benar-benar berusaha menyuguhkan permainan terbaik mereka. Liga Champions memang selalu spesial untuk Real Madrid.
Rodrygo-lah yang membuka kemenangan Madrid lewat gol cepat di menit ke-4. Lalu, tak genap tiga menit berikutnya, Rodrygo menggandakan koleksinya dengan gol di menit ke-7.
Dia bisa saja mencetak hattrick tercepat di Liga Champions seandainya diberi kesempatan mengeksekusi penalti di menit ke-14, tapi Sergio Ramos berkata lain. Rodrygo harus menunggu sampai ujung laga untuk menuntaskan trigol-nya.

Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
How does it feel to make a UCL hat trick at the age of 18, Rodrygo?
Nov 7 2019, 06:15 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Rodrygo Goes successfully listed his name in the Champions League history book. The young Real Madrid striker wrapped a perfect hat-trick in the 6-0 victory over Galatasaray on Thursday (11/07/2019) early morning hrs.
Playing at the Santiago Bernabeu, Los Blancos really tried to present their best game. The Champions League is always special for Real Madrid.
Rodrygo was the one who opened the Madrid victory through a quick goal in the 4th minute. Then, not even three minutes later, Rodrygo doubled his collection with a goal in the 7th minute.
He could have scored the fastest hat trick in the Champions League if he was given a chance to execute a penalty in the 14th minute, but Sergio Ramos said differently. Rodrygo must wait until the end of the fight to complete the trigol.

Read below, Bolaneters!
